resources.string: Committed to the cause of women’s education in the state of Jharkhand, Jamshedpur women’s college has come a long and luminous way, since its inception in 1953, Jamshedpur Women’s College a prestigious college for women, conferred with the status of a center with potential for excellence(CPE) by the University Grants Commission and awarded grade “A” By NACC. Presently Jamshedpur Women’s College is an Constituent autonomous college of kolhan University.
